name: The Slowest Race In History
description:
The Slowest Race In History is the single-player incremental clicker text-based racing game. Race around the track as fast as you can click, and see if you have what it takes to race against the best of the best - the infamous "Car #1" and "Car #2". 

Race for hours or seconds with our mode selection, and power up your engine to speed around the track even faster - but, of course, only in increments!

 It was inspired by Ludem Dare 41's theme of Combine 2 Incompatible Genres, and the resulting combination I got after playing around with this tool they promoted https://boltkey.cz/ld41roller/.
